channel.title: CVE Feed for Hancom -- Hancom office Hword NEO
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hancom -- Hancom office Hword NEO

item.title: CVE-2018-5195|2024-09-17T00:36:29.253Z -- hancom -- hancom%20office%20hword%20neo
item.description: Hancom NEO versions 9.6.1.5183 and earlier have a buffer Overflow vulnerability that leads remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands when performing the hyperlink Attributes in document.
